message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, your offer is way too high.  I'm willing to pay $8000 for this product, which is a fair price considering my budget. Let's work together to make this deal happen.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. However, I'm afraid $8000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value of the product. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $16000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10000.  This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can finalize this deal.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $10000, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $14000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product. I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Alice, I appreciate you continuing to negotiate with me, but $14000 is still outside of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12000, which is a fair price for this product.  Let's make this deal happen!

I understand that you're willing to go up to $12000, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $13500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product. I hope you can meet me in the middle.

Alice, I'm really trying to make this deal work, but $13500 is still a bit too high.  I'm willing to go up to $12000, which is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll need to explore other options.

I understand that you're willing to go up to $12000, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $13000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product. I hope you can meet me in the middle.
